faqs.question: How to get a loan?
faqs.answer: Visit our ATM with your national ID card. If you need guidance, contact our staff via ATM communication or call 77767776

faqs.question: How to register on TPay application?
faqs.answer: Get registration instructions from TPayMN page

faqs.question: Has my payment been processed?
faqs.answer: You can check your payment extensions by downloading our app

faqs.question: Can I get another loan?
faqs.answer: If your term hasn't expired, you can get a loan normally

faqs.question: What is your starting loan amount?
faqs.answer: Our loans are determined based on your information and credit limit

faqs.question: What is the maximum loan amount?
Can I extend the loan?
faqs.answer: Yes. Extensions are made depending on the amount taken
